input: How do I close my account?
expected: To close your account, go to Settings > Account and select close.

input: How do I delete my account?
expected: To delete your account, go to Settings > Account and select delete.

input: How do I cancel my account?
expected: To cancel your account, go to Settings > Account and select cancel.

input: I forgot my password. What do I do?
expected: You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot password' on the sign-in page.

input: I forgot my PIN. What do I do?
expected: You can reset your PIN by clicking 'Forgot PIN' on the sign-in page.
